text: Francesco Stallone Jr. (born July 30, 1950) is an American actor, singer- songwriter and guitarist. He is the younger brother of Sylvester Stallone. His song "Far from Over" appeared in the 1983 movie Staying Alive.80s Music Channel: Far From Over He was nominated for a Golden Globe Award and Grammy Award for this song. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Maryland Category:Musicians from Maryland Category:Writers from Maryland Category:Actors from Maryland
title: Frank Stallone
